some hiking advice

13 Aug 2006 I spent yesterday sitting and avoiding to stand up or walk around. During that time, I looked up a couple things on blisters and hiking.

These links will come in handy next year:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blisters
http://www.vonhof.typepad.com/happy_feet/
http://www.backpack45.com/pct.html
http://www.ehow.com/how_1065_avoid-getting-blisters.html
http://www.outdoorwomen.ca/section/tips/tips.htm
http://www.nutricraze.com/Article_about_Hiking-tips-the-art-of-avoiding-blisters-and-injuries-a-3871.html
http://www.hikingdude.com/hiking-blisters.shtml
http://smart-hiking.info/category/good-hiking-socks/
http://www.suslik.org/Writings/hikeaid.html
